statements: UPDATE threat_intelligence_feed SET threat_level = 'medium', update_frequency = 7 WHERE feed_id = 1;

UPDATE ThreatIntelligenceFeed SET description = 'New threat intelligence information', last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE feed_id = 1;
